Name: Simple Message Registry
Description: Collection of Basic messages for numerous use cases

Success.Description: Indicates that all conditions of a successful operation have been met.

GeneralError.Description: Indicates that a general error has occurred.
GeneralError.Message: A general error has occurred. See ExtendedInfo for more information.

ResourceAtUriUnauthorized.Description: Indicates that the attempt to access the resource/file/image at the URI was unauthorized.
ResourceAtUriUnauthorized.Message: While accessing the resource at %1, the service received an authorization error %2.
ResourceAtUriUnauthorized.Resolution: Ensure that the appropriate access is provided for the service in order for it to access the URI.
